title: Lycan

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- On full moons, choose a player's house to rampage at, dealing a basic attack to that player and all visitors.
- Once per game you may choose not to rampage at anyone's house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn the name of everyone you attack.
- If you don't select a target, you rampage at your own home.
- If you are roleblocked on a full moon, you stay home and rampage.
- After killing a second townie, you commit suicide out of guilt.

desc:
Post 5271
*"Get away from me! I can't be seen like this."*
